Text:
Oh, and this just in: Buy the album!! It is AWESOME.

Leaves the current sucky Nightwish and the pitiful "Anette" easily in its wake...

TARJA RULES!!! I recommend the special editon with a bonus DVD.
Thanks for sharing. Tarja is indeed very good but Dark Passion Play from NW is a great cd.
Whats's this shit??? It's fucking playback! And I thought Tarja had some pride...only bad singers do it playback on stage.
